verses.verse: Do we begin <WG756> <WG5731> again <WG3825> to commend <WG4921> <WG5721> ourselves <WG1438>? or <WG1508> need we <WG5535> <WG5719>, as <WG5613> some <WG5100> others, epistles <WG1992> of commendation <WG4956> to <WG4314> you <WG5209>, or <WG2228> letters of commendation <WG4956> from <WG1537> you <WG5216>?

Ye <WG5210> are <WG2075> <WG5748> our <WG2257> epistle <WG1992> written <WG1449> <WG5772> in <WG1722> our <WG2257> hearts <WG2588>, known <WG1097> <WG5746> and <WG2532> read <WG314> <WG5746> of <WG5259> all <WG3956> men <WG444>:

Forasmuch as ye are manifestly declared <WG5319> <WG5746> to <WG3754> be <WG2075> <WG5748> the epistle <WG1992> of Moshiach <WG5547> ministered <WG1247> <WG5685> by <WG5259> us <WG2257>, written <WG1449> <WG5772> not <WG3756> with ink <WG3188>, but <WG235> with the Spirit <WG4151> of the living <WG2198> <WG5723> 'Elohim <WG2316>; not <WG3756> in <WG1722> tables <WG4109> of stone <WG3035>, but <WG235> in <WG1722> fleshy <WG4560> tables <WG4109> of the heart <WG2588>.
And <WG1161> such <WG5108> trust <WG4006> have we <WG2192> <WG5719> through <WG1223> Moshiach <WG5547> to <WG4314> 'Elohim-ward <WG2316>:

Not <WG3756> that <WG3754> we are <WG2070> <WG5748> sufficient <WG2425> of <WG575> ourselves <WG1438> to think <WG3049> <WG5664> any thing <WG5100> as <WG5613> of <WG1537> ourselves <WG1438>; but <WG235> our <WG2257> sufficiency <WG2426> is of <WG1537> 'Elohim <WG2316>;

Who <WG3739> also <WG2532> hath made <WG2427> us <WG2248> able <WG2427> <WG5656> ministers <WG1249> of the new <WG2537> testament <WG1242>; not <WG3756> of the letter <WG1121>, but <WG235> of the spirit <WG4151>: for <WG1063> the letter <WG1121> killeth <WG615> <WG5719>, but <WG1161> the spirit <WG4151> giveth life <WG2227> <WG5719>.

But <WG1161> if <WG1487> the ministration <WG1248> of death <WG2288>, written <WG1722> <WG1121> and engraven <WG1795> <WG5772> in <WG1722> stones <WG3037>, was <WG1096> <WG5675> glorious <WG1722> <WG1391>, so <WG5620> that the children <WG5207> of Yisra'EL <WG2474> could <WG1410> <WG5738> not <WG3361> stedfastly behold <WG816> <WG5658> the face <WG1519> <WG4383> of Mosheh <WG3475> for <WG1223> the glory <WG1391> of his <WG846> countenance <WG4383>; which <WG3588> glory was to be done away <WG2673> <WG5746>:
How <WG4459> shall <WG1248> not <WG3780> the ministration <WG1248> of the spirit <WG4151> be <WG2071> <WG5704> rather <WG3123> <WG1722> glorious <WG1391>?

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> the ministration <WG1248> of condemnation <WG2633> be glory <WG1391>, much <WG4183> more <WG3123> doth the ministration <WG1248> of righteousness <WG1343> exceed <WG4052> <WG5719> in <WG1722> glory <WG1391>.

For <WG1063> even <WG2532> that which was made glorious <WG1392> <WG5769> had no <WG3761> glory <WG1392> <WG5772> in <WG1722> this <WG5129> respect <WG3313>, by reason <WG1752> of the glory <WG1391> that excelleth <WG5235> <WG5723>.
For <WG1063> if <WG1487> that which is done away <WG2673> <WG5746> was glorious <WG1223> <WG1391>, much <WG4183> more <WG3123> that which remaineth <WG3306> <WG5723> is glorious <WG1722> <WG1391>.
Seeing then <WG3767> that we have <WG2192> <WG5723> such <WG5108> hope <WG1680>, we use <WG5530> <WG5736> great <WG4183> plainness of speech <WG3954>:

And <WG2532> not <WG3756> as <WG2509> Mosheh <WG3475>, which put <WG5087> <WG5707> a vail <WG2571> over <WG1909> his <WG1438> face <WG4383>, that <WG4314> the children <WG5207> of Yisra'EL <WG2474> could <WG816> not <WG3361> stedfastly look <WG816> <WG5658> to <WG1519> the end <WG5056> of that which is abolished <WG2673> <WG5746>:

But <WG235> their <WG846> minds <WG3540> were blinded <WG4456> <WG5681>: for <WG1063> until <WG891> this day <WG4594> remaineth <WG3306> <WG5719> the same <WG846> vail <WG2571> untaken <WG3361> away <WG343> <WG5746> in <WG1909> the reading <WG320> of the old <WG3820> testament <WG1242>; which <WG3748> vail is done away <WG2673> <WG5743> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547>.
But <WG235> even <WG2193> unto this day <WG4594>, when <WG2259> Mosheh <WG3475> is read <WG314> <WG5743>, the vail <WG2571> is upon <WG2749> <WG5736> <WG1909> their <WG846> heart <WG2588>.
Nevertheless <WG1161> when <WG2259> it <WG302> shall turn <WG1994> <WG5661> to <WG4314> the YY <WG2962>, the vail <WG2571> shall be taken away <WG4014> <WG5743>.
Now <WG1161> the YY <WG2962> is <WG2076> <WG5748> that Spirit <WG4151>: and <WG1161> where <WG3757> the Spirit <WG4151> of the YY <WG2962> is, there <WG1563> is liberty <WG1657>.

But <WG1161> we <WG2249> all <WG3956>, with open <WG343> <WG5772> face <WG4383> beholding as in a glass <WG2734> <WG5734> the glory <WG1391> of the YY <WG2962>, are changed <WG3339> <WG5743> into the same <WG846> image <WG1504> from <WG575> glory <WG1391> to <WG1519> glory <WG1391>, even as <WG2509> by <WG575> the Spirit <WG4151> of the YY <WG2962>.
